welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ferizaj, Kosovo! Immerse yourself in the city's rich history, charming architecture, and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ferizaj has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pristina International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login with a valid email address.
